name: Ultra Frogsheen in Sonoland
description:
The Evil Baron Kargan has stolen the source of all happniess from the happy people of Sonoland! Only Frogsheen and his friends can defeat Baron Kargan and return happiness to the people of Sonoland!

Jump and fight your way through the worlds of Sonoland and face a variety of enemies on your way to Baron Kargan!

GAME IN DEVELOPMENT - DEMO AVAILABLE!

The Demo is FREE but if you want to help us and support development, we appreciate it!

'

NOTE: Native GamePad support isn't yet in the game, but I reccomend a program called "JoyToKey" to map the keyboard commands to your joystick.  Works like a charm!
The final version of Frogsheen will include 5 playable characters, and unlockable secrets! In development now and coming in 2020.
